// src/data/guideCardImageFallbacks.ts
// Generated fallback card images from EN guide content sections.
// Keep this lightweight map in sync when guide content image ordering changes.

import type { GuideCardImage } from "@/lib/guides/guideCardImage";

const GUIDE_CARD_IMAGE_FALLBACKS: Readonly<Record<string, GuideCardImage>> = {
  "ageAccessibility": { src: "/img/directions/hostel-brikette-entrance-steps.webp", alt: "The stairs up to Hostel Brikette's entrance, just off the main road in Positano." },

export function getGuideCardImageFallback(contentKey: string): GuideCardImage | null {
  return GUIDE_CARD_IMAGE_FALLBACKS[contentKey] ?? null;
}
